title: What The Board Needs To Know
description: Everything from the week beginning August 7, 2023, that a corporate board director needs to know ahead of a board meeting. This week we look at how a single large scale successful cyberattack could potentially affect up to one in five organizations worldwide. Plus: does your organization have a people-centric cybersecurity strategy? Is management going to be able to judge the materiality of a cyber incident within four days? And why are some companies holding off from signing up to the new EU-U.S. data transfer framework?
